forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 53. West southwest wind around 23 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn gently breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the morning begins with a promise of warmth tempered by cool breezes. Despite the sun striving to push through the remnants of the marine layer, wisps of fog cling reluctantly to the edges of the bay, particularly around the Golden Gate, creating an ethereal spectacle. The day holds onto mostly sunny skies, though expect the temperature to peak modestly at around 64 degrees before settling back into the embrace of the evening's coolness.

With west-southwest winds dancing between 7 to 24 mph, quite a bit of briskness accompanies the daylight, accentuated by occasional gusts that can surprise you. Tonight brings a clarity influenced by the shifting winds, allowing the stars to peek through as temperatures dip to a refreshing 53. In light of today’s conditions, lighter layers are advisable—a comfortable hoodie or a lightweight jacket will suit the morning stroll or a leisurely café visit. Activities could include a peaceful walk along the Embarcadero or perhaps a visit to one of the hidden green nooks within the city, where one can savor a moment of serenity while appreciating the vivid charm of San Francisco’s landscapes.
